required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 13, 2015
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase 1 Study of MP-424, Peginterferon Alfa 2b, and Ribavirin in Hepatitis C
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I, Open-Label, Two-Arm Study of MP-424 in Combination With Peginterferon Alfa 2b and Ribavirin in Patients With Genotype 1b Hepatitis C

oversight_info.authority: Japan: Ministry of Health, Labor and Welfare

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety, pharmacokinetics, HCV RNA kinetics, and other viral characteristics after administration of two arms of MP-424 in combination with Peginterferon Alfa 2b (PEG-IFN-a-2b) and Ribavirin (RBV) to patients with chronic hepatitis C.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Pharmacokinetics/Dynamics Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Open Label

primary_outcome.measure: Cmax (Maximum Observed Concentration in Plasma) of MP-424
primary_outcome.time_frame: Data were collected at Day1 to Day85
primary_outcome.description: Data were collected before the first dose in the morning, and at 1, 2.5, 4, 6, 8, 12, 16 and 24 h after the first dose on days 1, 14 and 85. Data as pre-dose were collected at Day3, Day8, Day29, Day43 and Day57.

primary_outcome.measure: Tmax (Time of Maximum Concentration in Plasma) of MP-424
primary_outcome.time_frame: Data were collected at Day1 to Day85
primary_outcome.description: Data were collected before the first dose in the morning, and at 1, 2.5, 4, 6, 8, 12, 16 and 24 h after the first dose on days 1, 14 and 85. Data as pre-dose were collected at Day3, Day8, Day29, Day43 and Day57.

primary_outcome.measure: AUC 0-8h (Area Under the Concentration-time Curve From Time Zero to 8 Hours) of MP-424
primary_outcome.time_frame: Data were collected at Day1 to Day85
primary_outcome.description: Data were collected before the first dose in the morning, and at 1, 2.5, 4, 6, 8, 12, 16 and 24 h after the first dose on days 1, 14 and 85. Data as pre-dose were collected at Day3, Day8, Day29, Day43 and Day57.

primary_outcome.measure: Ctrough (Minimum Observed Concentration in Plasma) of MP-424
primary_outcome.time_frame: Data were collected at Day1 to Day85
primary_outcome.description: Data were collected before the first dose in the morning, and at 1, 2.5, 4, 6, 8, 12, 16 and 24 h after the first dose on days 1, 14 and 85. Data as pre-dose were collected at Day3, Day8, Day29, Day43 and Day57.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Data were collected at Day1 to Day85
primary_outcome.description: Data were collected before the first dose in the morning, and at 1, 2.5, 4, 6, 8, 12, 16 and 24 h after the first dose on days 1, 14 and 85. Data as pre-dose were collected at Day3, Day8, Day29, Day43 and Day57.

secondary_outcome.measure: Antiviral Effects of TVR on HCV Were Assessed by Measuring Plasma HCV RNA Levels
secondary_outcome.description: HCV RNA concentrations were determined using the COBAS TaqMan HCV test (Roche Diagnostics). The linear dynamic range of the assay was 1.2-7.8 log10 IU/mL.

intervention.description: MP-424 (three tablets of 250mg tablet at a time, every 8 hours) + PEG-IFN-a-2b + RBV for 12 weeks
MP-424 (two tablets of 250mg tablet at a time, every 8 hours) + PEG-IFN-a-2b + RBV for 12 weeks

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients diagnosed with genotype 1b chronic hepatitis C
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients diagnosed with decompensated cirrhosis
- Patients diagnosed with positive HBs antigen in the test

results_reference.citation: Suzuki F, Suzuki Y, Sezaki H, Akuta N, Seko Y, Kawamura Y, Hosaka T, Kobayashi M, Saito S, Arase Y, Ikeda K, Mineta R, Watahiki S, Kobayashi M, Nakayasu Y, Tsuda H, Aoki K, Yamada I, Kumada H. Exploratory study on telaprevir given every 8 h at 500 mg or 750 mg with peginterferon-alpha-2b and ribavirin in hepatitis C patients. Hepatol Res. 2013 Jul;43(7):691-701. doi: 10.1111/hepr.12009. Epub 2012 Nov 29.
